description: I want to verify that the files and subdirectories in the source directory were successfully copied to the destination directory. If successful, tell me yes, else no.

create.init:
mkdir ./source && ./destination
echo 123 > /source/tmp
echo 123 > /source/tmp123
echo 123 > /source/tmp321
cp -r source destination
